Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Hotel Kempinski Geneva, you'll be centrally located in Geneva, steps from The Library In English and Sisi Monument. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Paquis Baths and Mont Blanc Bridge.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 412 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and plasma televisions. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a nightclub, a health club, and an indoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 4 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at a poolside bar, a swim-up bar, or one of 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Geneva? This hotel has facilities measuring 11582 square feet (1076 square meters), including meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 4 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at a poolside bar, a swim-up bar, or one of 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Library In English - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Sisi Monument - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Paquis Baths - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Mont Blanc Bridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Rousseau Island - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Jet d'Eau Fountain - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Flower Clock - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Notre Dame Basilica - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
English Garden Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Cité du Temps - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Molard Tower - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Anglais Garden - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Port Des Eaux-Vives - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Barbier-Mueller Archeology Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Baby Beach - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Kempinski Geneva is Geneva International Airport (GVA) - 4 km / 2.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
